chapters.title: Chapter 6:  Questioning Intentions
chapters.info: Edarra, p. 127—Wise One of the Nader sept of the Shiande Aiel. She has blue eyes and fair hair, and looks not much older than Perrin even though she is one of the oldest of the Wise Ones who travel with Perrin. She can channel, and is of moderately great strength. She went with Perrin to seek out Masema. She objected, quite strongly, to Perrin's decision to let the Seanchan capture Shaido Wise Ones as damane.
